scripts.upload-uccrestlib: cd UCC-REST-lib && python setup.py sdist upload -r pypisolutionslocal
scripts.upload-uccrestbuilder: cd UCC-REST-builder && python setup.py sdist upload -r pypisolutionslocal
scripts.upload: npm run upload-uccrestbuilder && npm run upload-uccrestlib
scripts.build-example-addon: cd ./UCC-example-addon && python setup.py && source ${SPLUNK_HOME}/bin/setSplunkEnv && python build.py
scripts.build-ui-lib: cd ./UCC-UI-lib && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-example-addon && npm run upload
